#summary Add or update data attached to a login session.
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||UpdateSession||String||Yes||
||`SessionID`||UUID of the session to update||UUID||Yes||
||`SecureSessionID`||Secure identifier to use for this session. Must only be transmitted across secure channels||UUID||Optional||
||`SceneID`||UUID of the scene that the avatar is currently in||UUID||Optional||
||`ScenePosition`||Scene-relative current position of the avatar||Vector3d||Optional||
||`SceneLookAt`||Normalized direction vector where the avatar is currently looking||Vector3d||Optional||
||`ExtraData`||Free form JSON data attached to the session||JSON||Optional||

{{{
RequestMethod=UpdateSession
&SessionID=b4b37915-2394-42e3-9649-f33df30cb4f4
&SceneID=f60ea75b-6473-42fa-aa05-e29090e6b0f7
&ScenePosition=%3C128%2C%20128%2C%2025%3E
&SceneLookAt=%3C1%2C%200%2C%200%3E
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if a session was updated, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"Session does not exist"
}
}}}
